text:
> It looks like empty packages generated by PkgTemplates.jl are automatically accepted.
What do you mean with this. All packages are accepted if they pass the automatic checks. These automatic checks does not involve there being code in the package (maybe they should). But I don't see how PkgTemplates is relevant to this?

elements.text: It looks like empty packages generated by PkgTemplates.jl are automatically accepted.

What do you mean with this. All packages are accepted if they pass the automatic checks. These automatic checks does not involve there being code in the package (maybe they should). But I don't see how PkgTemplates is relevant to this?

text:
I guess it means they are not strictly empty repos.
They would pass a check on the folder structure etc
